DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Plans a path to the destination that avoids areas whose depth is less than the given depth value. Then moves on that path.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>destinationObject</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Destination</myLabel> <myToolTip>Movement destination.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Waypoints</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtWaypointsFilter;DtOverlayPointsFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

Otherwise use the specified value..</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Select value:</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Use ship draft;Select value:</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
